page.title: 02Southampton Supermarket.
page.content:
{A Day In The Life of a Sainsburys {Manager......}
7:00 time to get up.I get dressed, go downstairs and have some cornflakes. 7:45 I leave for work.I turn the keys of my Granada,then I'm off.10 minutes later I'm there. I go round all the store making sure that all shelves are in stock.Then at 12:30 I go for a lunch break. At 13:30 I go to my office and sort out my letters and write some paperwork. Afterwards I go to a computer and see if the stock we've ordered has come yet.I check the time and if it is too late I go home. I go home after the store closes and sometimes I might not get home till 10:30.Then its bed!.
